name: Slither Warrior
description:
Play a serpent warrior fighting rats!

Grow in power (and length!) while killing as many of them as possible.

My entry for My First Game Jam Winter 2023.

Controls:

Directional arrows: orient the snake and pick choice

Spacebar: pause and validate choice

Mouse: hover on a rat to see its stats

Available with an installer for Windows.

Credits :

Art: LLGD, Rallix, AntumDeluge

Music: CTCollab

I made this game by myself, in about 50 h over 10 days. This is the first game that I create in such a short time.

I tried to do as much as I could on my own, including most of the sprites. Sound creation wasn't an option though, and the deadline forced me to use some open source sprites as well.

This was fun! There are many ideas that could not make their way into the game before the deadline, so I'll be sure to revisit this someday! In the meantime, any review, comment or advice is appreciated.
